title: Maple Leaf
heading: Amtrak & VIA Rail's Maple Leaf
programmers_warning: Long version (won't work): Maple Leaf Canadian station data is missing from Amtrak GTFS as of 10 Jan 2023
top_text:
The Maple Leaf is operated jointly by Amtrak and VIA Rail Canada.
Local tickets within Canada can be bought from VIA Rail.

Appropriate documentation (passports, visas, vaccination cards, etc.) is required to cross the US-Canadian border; please check government websites for details.
